original_title: A Parte do Mundo Que Me Pertence
overview: Documentary about dreams and desires of ordinary people, about fuels that move us daily: happiness, recognition, financial stability, marriage, health, fun, a few pounds less, enjoyment, overcoming or even a simple and humble kite.
tagline: Documentary about the lives and dreams of nine people in a big city.
title: The Part of the World That Belongs to Me
